languages.text: "Пусть каторжане и надзиратели вооружатся и дадут бой вторженцам".
"Arm the convicts and the overseers and have them fight the invaders."
languages.original_text: "Пусть каторжане и надзиратели вооружатся и дадут бой вторженцам".

traits.locale_text: "Arm the convicts and the wardens up and have them fight the invaders."
"Arm the convicts and the wardens up and have them fight the invaders."
"Arm the convicts and the wardens and have them fight the invaders."
"Arm the convicts and the wardens and have them fight the invaders."
"Arm the convicts and the overseers and have them fight the invaders."

languages.text: “让所有囚犯和看守武装起来，抗击入侵者。”
languages.original_text: "Arm the convicts and the wardens and have them fight the invaders."

traits.locale_text: “让所有囚犯和看守武装起来，抗击入侵者。”

languages.text: «Pertrechen a los presos y a los guardias y hagan que luchen contra los invasores».
languages.original_text: "Arm the convicts and the wardens and have them fight the invaders."

traits.locale_text: «Pertrechen a los presos y a los guardias y hagan que luchen contra los invasores».

languages.text: 「受刑者と看守を武装させ、インヴェイダーと戦わせるんだ」
languages.original_text: "Arm the convicts and the wardens and have them fight the invaders."

traits.locale_text: 「受刑者と看守を武装させ、インヴェイダーと戦わせるんだ」

languages.text: « Armez les détenus et les gardiens, qu'ils puissent combattre ces créatures. »
languages.original_text: "Arm the convicts and the wardens and have them fight the invaders."

traits.locale_text: « Armez les détenus et les gardiens, qu'ils puissent combattre ces créatures. »

languages.text: "Bewaffnet die Sträflinge und die Wächter und lasst sie gegen die Invasoren kämpfen."
languages.original_text: "Arm the convicts and the wardens and have them fight the invaders."

traits.locale_text: "Bewaffnet die Sträflinge und die Wächter und lasst sie gegen die Invasoren kämpfen."
